summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented via new entries in resumeContent and ExperienceSection renders experience cards. However, there is insufficient direct diff evidence that the Technical Projects section layout was updated to a 2-column desktop grid (REQ-4) or that ProjectsSection typography/spacing alignment was addressed (REQ-5). Some unrequested UI changes were added to Experience cards (e.g., “Current Role” badge, 2-column grid for Experience).

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix the desktop (PC) layout for the Technical Projects cards so that on desktop widths the section shows two cards per row (when there are at least two projects), rather than a single wide full-width card; keep mobile single-column; consistent spacing; no horizontal scroll.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided diff summary does not include the contents of `frontend/src/components/portfolio/ProjectsSection.tsx`, so there is no direct evidence in the shown changes that the Technical Projects cards were converted to a 2-column desktop grid or that overflow/scroll issues were addressed.
evidence: MODIFIED FILES list does not show a code diff for frontend/src/components/portfolio/ProjectsSection.tsx (only mentioned in frontend-file-summaries.txt)

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure Experience and Technical Projects sections have perfectly aligned, consistent spacing/typography and maintain existing hover/focus interaction consistency.
missing_requirements.reason: ExperienceSection shows updated spacing/typography/hover behavior, but there is no direct diff evidence for corresponding alignment/typography/interaction updates in the Technical Projects section (ProjectsSection content not shown).
evidence: MODIFIED FILES list does not show a code diff for frontend/src/components/portfolio/ProjectsSection.tsx

hallucinated_features.description: Added a “Current Role” badge shown only for the first experience entry (index === 0).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not ask for labeling the first experience as “Current Role”; it only requested adding a new experience entry and keeping card structure consistent.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed the Experience section to a 2-column grid on desktop (md:grid-cols-2).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest’s layout requirement (2-column desktop grid) was specifically for Technical Projects cards (REQ-4), not for the Experience section.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a “Key Responsibilities:” subheading above the experience bullet list.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not request adding new subheadings/labels within experience cards, only to match the existing experience card structure.
